mapper.sql: VENUES_ID as venuesId , VENUES_NAME as venuesName, RELIGIOUS_SECT as religiousSect, REGISTER_NBR as registerNbr, VENUES_PHONE as venuesPhone, ORGANIZATION as organization, VENUES_ADDRES as venuesAddres, PICTURES_PATH as picturesPath, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON as responsiblePerson, LIAISON_MAN as liaisonMan, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION as briefIntroduction, VENUES_STATUS as venuesStatus, CREATOR as creator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_MODIFIER as lastModifier, LAST_MODIFY_TIME as lastModifyTime

VENUES_ID as venuesId , VENUES_NAME as venuesName, rm_venues_info.RELIGIOUS_SECT as religiousSect, REGISTER_NBR as registerNbr, VENUES_PHONE as venuesPhone, ORGANIZATION as organization, VENUES_ADDRES as venuesAddres, PICTURES_ONE as picturesOne, PICTURES_TWO as picturesTwo, PICTURES_THREE as picturesThree, rm_venues_info.RESPONSIBLE_PERSON as responsiblePerson, LIAISON_MAN as liaisonMan, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION as briefIntroduction, VENUES_STATUS as venuesStatus, rm_staff_info.STAFF_CD as staffCd, STAFF_CN_NM as staffName, CERT_TYPE_CD as certTypeCd, CERT_NBR as certNbr, STAFF_PICTURE as staffPicture, STAFF_TELPHONE as staffTelphone, STAFF_STATUS as staffStatus, STAFF_POST as staffPost,
mapper.select: SELECT FROM rm_venues_info INNER JOIN rm_staff_info ON rm_staff_info.STAFF_CD=rm_venues_info.RESPONSIBLE_PERSON
mapper.insert: insert into RM_VENUES_INFO( VENUES_ID, VENUES_NAME, RELIGIOUS_SECT, REGISTER_NBR, VENUES_PHONE, ORGANIZATION, VENUES_ADDRES, PICTURES_PATH, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON, LIAISON_MAN, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION, VENUES_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, LAST_MODIFIER, LAST_MODIFY_TIME )values ( #{venuesId}, #{venuesName}, #{religiousSect}, #{registerNbr}, #{venuesPhone}, #{organization}, #{venuesAddres}, #{picturesPath}, #{responsiblePerson}, #{liaisonMan}, #{briefIntroduction}, #{venuesStatus}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModifyTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RM_VENUES_INFO set VENUES_ADDRES=#{venuesAddres}, PICTURES_PATH=#{picturesPath}, RELIGIOUS_SECT=#{religiousSect}, VENUES_PHONE=#{venuesPhone}, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON=#{responsiblePerson}, LIAISON_MAN=#{liaisonMan}, ORGANIZATION=#{organization}, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION=#{briefIntroduction}, LAST_MODIFIER=#{lastModifier}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME= #{lastModifyTime} WHERE VENUES_ID = #{venuesId}
update RM_VENUES_INFO set VENUES_STATUS='02' where VENUES_ID = #{venuesId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(VENUES_ID) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN RELIGIOUS_SECT = '100100000005' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Islamism, SUM(CASE WHEN RELIGIOUS_SECT = '100100000003' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Christianity, SUM(CASE WHEN RELIGIOUS_SECT = '100100000004' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Catholicism, SUM(CASE WHEN RELIGIOUS_SECT = '100100000001' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Buddhism, SUM(CASE WHEN RELIGIOUS_SECT = '100100000002' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Taoism FROM rm_venues_info where VENUES_STATUS='01'
select count(VENUES_ID) from RM_VENUES_INFO where VENUES_STATUS!='02'
